arabicText: قُل لَّآ أَقُولُ لَكُمْ عِندِى خَزَآئِنُ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَعْلَمُ ٱلْغَيْبَ وَلَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمْ إِنِّى مَلَكٌ ۖ إِنْ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ ۚ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ وَٱلْبَصِيرُ ۚ أَفَلَا تَتَفَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“I	do	not	say	to	
you	 that	 I	 possess	 the	 treasures	 of	Allah,	
nor	do	 I	say	 that	 I	gain	knowledge	of	 the	
hidden	on	my	own,	nor	do	I	say	to	you	that	
I	am	an	angel;	I	only	follow	whatis	divinely	
revealed	to	me”;	say,	“Will	the	blind	and	the	sighted	ever	be	equal?	So	do	you	not	think?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmā	 do	 maiñ	 tum	 se	 nahi	 kahta	
mere	pās	Allah	ke	khazāne	haiñ	aur	na	yeh	
kahuñ	ke	maiñ	āap	ghaib	jān	letā	huñ	aur	
na	tum	se	yeh	kahuñ	ke	maiñ	farishtā	huñ	
maiñ	to	usi	kā	tāb'e	huñ	jo	waḥi	mujhe	āati	
hai	 tum	 farmāo	 kyā	 barābar	 ho	 jāyeñ	 ge	
andhe	aur	ankhiyāre	to	kyā	tum	ghour	nahi	karte	.

arabicText: وَأَنذِرْ بِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ أَن يُحْشَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ ۙ لَيْسَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ وَلِىٌّۭ وَلَا شَفِيعٌۭ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	with	this	Qur’an	warn	those	who	fear,	that	they	will	be	raised	towards	their	Lord	in	a	state	
when,	except	Allah,	there	will	be	no	protector	for	them	nor	an	intercessor,	so	that	they	may	be	
pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	is	Qur'ān	se	unheñ	darāo	jinheñ	khouf	ho	ke	apne	Rab	ki	taraf	yuñ	uthāye	jāyeñ	ke	Allah	ke	
siwā	na	un	kā	koi	himāyati	ho	na	koi	sifārishi	is	ummid	par	ke	woh	parhezgār	ho	jāyeñ.	.

arabicText: وَلَا تَطْرُدِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَدَوٰةِ وَٱلْعَشِىِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَجْهَهُۥ ۖ مَا عَلَيْكَ مِنْ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ وَمَا مِنْ حِسَابِكَ عَلَيْهِم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ فَتَطْرُدَهُمْ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 do	 not	 repel	 those	 who	 call	 upon	 their	 Lord	 in	 the	 morning	 and	 evening,	 seeking	 His	
pleasure;	you	are	not	responsible	for	their	account	nor	are	they	responsible	for	your	account	-
then	your	repelling	them	would	be	far	from	justice.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	door	na	karo	unheñ	jo	apne	Rab	ko	pukārte	haiñ	subah	aur	shām	us	ki	rizā	chāhte	tum	par	
un	ke	hisāb	se	kuchh	nahi	aur	un	par	tumhāre	hisāb	se	kuchh	nahi	phir	unheñ	tum	door	karo	to	
yeh	kām	insāf	se	ba'eed	hai.

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ فَتَنَّا بَعْضَهُم بِبَعْضٍۢ لِّيَقُولُوٓا۟ أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّنۢ بَيْنِنَآ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعْلَمَ بِٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 similarly We	 have	 made	 some	 as	 a	
trial	 for	 others	 - that	 the	 wealthy	
disbelievers	 upon	 seeing	 the	 needy	
Muslims	 say,	 “Are	 these	 whom	 Allah has	
favoured	 among	 us?”	 Does	 not	 Allah
recognise	those	who	are	thankful?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yuñ	hi	hum	ne	un	me	ek	ko	doosre	ke	
liye	 fitna	 banāyā	 ke	 māldār	 kāfir	 mohtāj	
Musalmānoñ	 ko	 dekh	 kar	 kaheñ	 kyā	 yeh	
haiñ	jin par	Allah	ne	ahsān	kiyā	hum	me	se	
kyā	 Allah	 khoob	 nahi	 jāntā	 Haq	 mānne	
wāloñ	ko.

arabicText: وَإِذَا جَآءَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَقُلْ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ كَتَبَ رَبُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ ٱلرَّحْمَةَ ۖ أَنَّهُۥ مَنْ عَمِلَ مِنكُمْ سُوٓءًۢا بِجَهَـٰلَةٍۢ ثُمَّ تَابَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ وَأَصْلَحَ فَأَنَّهُۥ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	those	who	believe	in	Our	signs	
come	 humbly	 in	 your	 presence,	 say	 to	
them,	“Peace	be	upon	you	- your	Lord	has	
made	 mercy	 obligatory	 upon	 His	 grace	 -
that	whoever	among	you	commits	a	sin	by	
folly	 and	 thereafter	 repents	 and	 reforms	
(himself),	 then	 indeed	 Allah is	 Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	tumhāre	huzoor	woh	hāzir	hoñ	jo	
hamāri	Āayatoñ	par	Imān		laāte	haiñ	to	un	
se	farmāo	tum	par	salām	tumhāre	Rab	ne	
apne	zimme karam	par	rehmat	lāzim	kar	li	
hai	 ke tum	 me	 jo	 koi	 nādāni	 se	 kuchh	
burāyi	kar	baithe	phir	is	ke	b'ad	touba	kare	
aur	 sañwar	 jāye	 to	 be-shak Allah	 bakhsh	
ne		wālā	maherbān		hai.

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ وَلِتَسْتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 this	 is	 how	 We	 explain	 Our	 verses	
clearly	and	so	that	the	way	of	the	criminals	
become	well	exposed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 isi	 tarah	 hum	 Āayatoñ	 ko	 mufassil	
bayān	farmāte	haiñ	aur	is	liye	ke	mujrimoñ	
kā	rastā	zāhir	ho	jāye

arabicText: قُلْ إِنِّى نُهِيتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُل لَّآ أَتَّبِعُ أَهْوَآءَكُمْ ۙ قَدْ ضَلَلْتُ إِذًۭا وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “I	 have	 been	 forbidden	 to	 worship	
those	 whom	 you	 worship	 other	 than	
Allah”;	say,	“I	do	not	follow	your	desires	- if	
it	were,	I	would	then	go	astray	and	not	be	
on	the	right	path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo mujhe	man'a	kiyā	gayā	hai	ke	
un	 ko	 poojuñ	 jin	 ko	 tum	 Allah	 ke	 siwā	
poojte	 ho	 tum	 farmāo	 maiñ	 tumhāri	
khwāhish	par	nahi	chaltā	 yuñ	ho	 to	maiñ	
bahak	jāoñ	aur	rāh	par	na	rahuñ

arabicText: قُلْ إِنِّى عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّى وَكَذَّبْتُم بِهِۦ ۚ مَا عِندِى مَا تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْحُكْمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِ ۖ يَقُصُّ ٱلْحَقَّ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلْفَـٰصِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“I	am	on	the	clear	proof	from	my	Lord,	
whereas	you	deny	Him;	I	do	not	have	what	
you	 are	 impatient	 for;	 there	 is	 no	
command	 except	 that	 of	 Allah;	 He	 states	
the	truth	and	He	is	the	Best	of	Judges."
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	maiñ	 to	apne	Rab	ki	 taraf	se	
raushan	daleel	par	huñ	aur	tum	usey	jhutlāte	ho	mere	pās	nahi	jis	ki	tum	jaldi	machā	rahe	ho	
hukm	nahi	magar	Allah	kā	woh	haq	farmātā	hai	aur	woh	sab	se	bahtar	faisalā	karne	wālā.

arabicText: قُل لَّوْ أَنَّ عِندِى مَا تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِهِۦ لَقُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“If	I	had	the	thing	for	which	you	are	impatient,	then	the	matter	between	me	and	you	would	
have	already	been	decided”;	and	Allah is	Well	Aware	of	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	agar	mere	pās	hoti	woh	cheez	jis	ki	tum	jaldi	kar	rahe	ho	to	mujh	me	tum	me	kām	
khatam	ho	chukā	hotā	aur	Allah	khoob	jāntā	hai	sitam	gāroñ	ko	.

arabicText: ۞ وَعِندَهُۥ مَفَاتِحُ ٱلْغَيْبِ لَا يَعْلَمُهَآ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ ۚ وَمَا تَسْقُطُ مِن وَرَقَةٍ إِلَّا يَعْلَمُهَا وَلَا حَبَّةٍۢ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا رَطْبٍۢ وَلَا يَابِسٍ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	has	the	keys	of	the	hidden	- only	He	knows	them;	and	He	knows	all	that	is	in	the	
land	and	the	sea;	and	no	leaf	falls	but	He	knows	it	- and	there	is	not	a	grain	in	the	darkness	of	the	
earth,	nor	anything	wet	or	dry,	which	is	not	recorded	in	a	clear	Book.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	usi	ke	pās	haiñ	kunjiyāñ	ghaib	ki	unheñ	wohi	jāntā	hai	aur	jāntā	hai	jo	kuchh	Khushki	aur	tari	
me	hai	aur	jo	pattā	girtā	hai	woh	usey	jāntā	hai	aur	koi	dānā	nahi	zameen	ki	andheriyoñ	me	aur	
na	koi	tar	aur	na	khushk	jo	ek	roshan	kitāb	me	likhā	na	ho

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم بِٱلَّيْلِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا جَرَحْتُم بِٱلنَّهَارِ ثُمَّ يَبْعَثُكُمْ فِيهِ لِيُقْضَىٰٓ أَجَلٌۭ مُّسَمًّۭى ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 it	 is	 He	 Who	 removes	 your	 souls	 at	
night	(while	 asleep)	 and	 knows	whatever	
you	 commit	 by	 day;	 then	 He	 raises	 you	
again	during	the	day,	to	complete	the	term	
appointed	(for	you);	then	it	is	to	Him	that	
you	are	to	return	- He	will	then	inform	you	
of	what	you	used	to	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 wohi	 hai	 jo	 rāt	 ko	 tumhāri	 Roohieñ	
qabaz	kartā	hai	aur	jāntā	hai	jo	kuchh	din	
me	kamāo	phir	tumheñ		din	me	uthātā	hai	
ke	thahrāyi	hui	mi'aad	poori	ho	phir	usi	ki	
taraf	tumheñ phirnā	hai	phir	woh	batā	de	
gā	jo	kuchh	tum	karte	the

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلْقَاهِرُ فَوْقَ عِبَادِهِۦ ۖ وَيُرْسِلُ عَلَيْكُمْ حَفَظَةً حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ تَوَفَّتْهُ رُسُلُنَا وَهُمْ لَا يُفَرِّطُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	He	is	Omnipotent	over	His	bondmen	
and	 sends	 guardians	 over	 you;	 to	 the	
extent	 that	 when	 death	 comes	 to	 one	 of	
you,	Our	angels	remove	his	soul,	and	they	
do	not	err.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi	ghālib	hai	apne	bandoñ	par	aur	
tum	par	nigahbān	bhejtā	hai	yahān	tak	ke	
jab	 tum	me	 kisi	 ko	maut	āati	 hai	 hamāre	
Farishte	 uski	 Rooh	 qabaz	 karte	 haiñ	 aur	
woh	qusoor	nahi	karte

arabicText: ثُمَّ رُدُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوْلَىٰهُمُ ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ أَلَا لَهُ ٱلْحُكْمُ وَهُوَ أَسْرَعُ ٱلْحَـٰسِبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	(the	souls)	are	then	returned	towards	
their	True	Lord	- Allah;	pay	heed!	Only	His	
is	the	command;	and	He	is	the	Swiftest	At	
Taking	Account.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 phere	jāte	 haiñ	 apne	 sachche	moulā	
Allah	ki	taraf	suntā	hai	usi	ka	hukm	hai aur	
woh	sab	se	jald	hisāb	karne	wālā

arabicText: قُلْ مَن يُنَجِّيكُم مِّن ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ تَدْعُونَهُۥ تَضَرُّعًۭا وَخُفْيَةًۭ لَّئِنْ أَنجَىٰنَا مِنْ هَـٰذِهِۦ لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Who	rescues	you	from	the	calamities	
of	 the	 land	 and	 the	 sea	- Whom	 you	 call	
upon	crying	loudly	and	in	whispers	that,	‘If	
we	are	 saved	 from	 this	we	will	 surely	 be	
grateful’?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	woh	kaun		hai	jo	tumheñ		nijāt	
detā	hai	jangle	aur	dariyā	ki	āafatoñ	se	jise	
pukārte	ho	gidgidā	kar	aur	āahista	ke		agar	
woh	hamieñ	is	se	bachāye	 to	hum	zaroor	
ehsān	māñe	ge

arabicText: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُنَجِّيكُم مِّنْهَا وَمِن كُلِّ كَرْبٍۢ ثُمَّ أَنتُمْ تُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “Allah delivers	 you	 from	 these	 and	
from	 all	 distresses - yet	 you	 ascribe	
partners	to	Him!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	Allah	tumheñ		najāt	detā	hai	is	
se	 aur	 har	 be-chaini	 se	 phir	 tum	 shareek	
thahrāte	ho

arabicText: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلْقَادِرُ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَبْعَثَ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابًۭا مِّن فَوْقِكُمْ أَوْ مِن تَحْتِ أَرْجُلِكُمْ أَوْ يَلْبِسَكُمْ شِيَعًۭا وَيُذِيقَ بَعْضَكُم بَأْسَ بَعْضٍ ۗ ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَفْقَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“He	is	Able	to	send	punishment	upon	
you	from	above	you	or	from	beneath	your	
feet,	or	to	cause	you	to	fight	each	other	by	
dividing	 you	 into	 different	 groups,	 and	
make	 you	 taste	 the	 harshness	 of	 one	
another”;	observe	how	We	explain	the	verses	so	that	they	may	understand.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	 woh	 qādir	 hai	 ke	 tum	 par	
‘aƶāb	 bheje	 tumhāre	 upar	 se	 yā	 tumhāre	
pā'oñ	 ke	 tale	 se	 yā	 tumheñ bhidā	 de	
mukhtalif	giroh	kar	ke	aur	ek	ko	doosre	ki	
sakhti	 chakhāye	 dekho	 hum	 kyuñ	 kar	
tarah	 tarah	 se	 āayatieñ	 bayān	 karte	 haiñ	
kahiñ	un	ko	samajh	ho

arabicText: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوْمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ ۚ قُل لَّسْتُ عَلَيْكُم بِوَكِيلٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	your	people	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	denied	it	whereas	
this	is	undoubtedly	the	truth;	say,	“I	am	not	responsible	for	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	usey	jhutlāyā	tumhāri	Qaum	ne	aur	yahi	haq	hai	tum	farmāo	maiñ	tum	par	kuchh	kadodā	
(nigahbān)	nahi

arabicText: لِّكُلِّ نَبَإٍۢ مُّسْتَقَرٌّۭ ۚ وَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText: All	matters	have	a	fixed	time	and	soon	you	will	come	to	know.
romanUrduTranslationText: Har	khabar	kā	ek	waqt	muqarrar	hai	aur	an-qareeb	jān	jāo	ge.

arabicText: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخُوضُونَ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَأَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُوا۟ فِى حَدِيثٍ غَيْرِهِۦ ۚ وَإِمَّا يُنسِيَنَّكَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فَلَا تَقْعُدْ بَعْدَ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ مَعَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	O	listener	(followers	of	this	Prophet)	when	you	see	those	who	argue	in	Our	verses,	turn	away	
from	them	until	they	engage	in	another	topic;	and	if	the	devil	causes	you	to	forget,	then	do	not	sit	
with	the	unjust	after	remembering.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	aey	sunne	wāle!	Jub	tu	unheñ	dekhe	jo	hamāri	Āayatoñ	me	padte	haiñ	tu	un	se	muñh		pher	le	
jab	tak	aur	bāt	me	padeñ	aur	jo	kahiñ	shaitān	bhulāwe	to	yād	āaye	par	zālimoñ	ke	pās	na baith.

arabicText: وَمَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ مِنْ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ وَلَـٰكِن ذِكْرَىٰ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	pious	are	not	accountable	for	them	
in	the	least,	apart	from	the	giving	of	advice	
so	that	they	may	avoid.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	parhezgāroñ	par	un	ke	hisāb	se	kuchh	
nahi	 hāñ	 naseehat	 denā	 shāyad	woh	 b’az	
āayeñ

arabicText: وَذَرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ دِينَهُمْ لَعِبًۭا وَلَهْوًۭا وَغَرَّتْهُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ وَذَكِّرْ بِهِۦٓ أَن تُبْسَلَ نَفْسٌۢ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِىٌّۭ وَلَا شَفِيعٌۭ وَإِن تَعْدِلْ كُلَّ عَدْلٍۢ لَّا يُؤْخَذْ مِنْهَآ ۗ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُبْسِلُوا۟ بِمَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۖ لَهُمْ شَرَابٌۭ مِّنْ حَمِيمٍۢ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْفُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 forsake	 those	 who	 have	 made	 their	
religion	a	mockery	and	play,	and	whom	the	
worldly	life	has	deceived	- and	advise	them	
with	this	Qur’an	so	that	a	soul	may	not	be	
seized	for	what	it	earns;	other	than	Allah it	
will	 not	 have	 a	 protector	 nor	 an	
intercessor;	 and	 if	 it	 offers	 every	
recompense	 in	 exchange	 for	 itself,	 it	 will	
not	be	accepted	from	it;	these	are	the	ones	
who	 are	 seized	 for	 their	 own	 deeds;	 for	
them	is	boiling	water	to	drink	and	a	painful	
punishment,	 as	 a	 recompense	 of	 their	
disbelief.	(The	disbelievers	will	not	have	any	
intercessors.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 chord	 de	 unko	 jinhoñ	 ne	 apna	 deen	
hañsi	 khel	 banā	liyā	 aur	 unheñ	 duniyā	 ki	
zindagi	 ne	 fareb	 diyā	 aur	 Qur'ān	 se	
naseehat	do	ke	kahiñ	koi	jān	apne	kiye	par	
pakdi	 na	 jāye	 Allah	 ke	 siwā	 na	 us ka	 koi	
himāyati	ho	na	sifārishi	aur	agar	apne	Íwaz	
sāre	badle	de	to	us	se	na	liye	jāyeñ	yeh	haiñ	
aur	 woh	 jo	 apne	 kiye	 par	 pakde	 gaye	
unheñ	peene	ko	khoultā	pāni	aur	dard-nāk	
‘aƶāb	badla	un	ke	kufar	kā.

arabicText: قُلْ أَنَدْعُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُنَا وَلَا يَضُرُّنَا وَنُرَدُّ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَابِنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَىٰنَا ٱللَّهُ كَٱلَّذِى ٱسْتَهْوَتْهُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ حَيْرَانَ لَهُۥٓ أَصْحَـٰبٌۭ يَدْعُونَهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَى ٱئْتِنَا ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ هُوَ ٱلْهُدَىٰ ۖ وَأُمِرْنَا لِنُسْلِمَ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “Shall	 we	 worship,	 other	 than	Allah,	
that	which	neither	 benefits	 us	nor	 harms	
us,	 and	 (therefore)	 be	 turned	 back	 after	
Allah has	 guided	 us,	 like	 one	 whom	 the	
devils	 have	 led	 astray	 in	 the	 earth	 -
bewildered?;	 his	 companions	 call	 him	 to	
the	 path	 (saying),	 ‘Come	 here’”;	 say,	
“Indeed	only	 the	guidance	of	Allah is	(the	
true)	guidance;	and	we	are	commanded	to	
submit	to	the	Lord	Of	The	Creation.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	kyā	hum	Allah	ke	siwā	us	ko	
poojeiñ	jo	 na	 hamārā	 bhalā	 kare	 na	 burā	
aur	ulte	pāo		palta	diyeñ	jāyeñ	b’ad		is	ke	ke	
Allah	ne	hamieñ	rāh	dikhāyi	us	ki	tarah	jise	
shaitānon	ne	zameen	me	rāh	bhulā	di	hairān	hai	us	ke	rafeeq	usey	rāh	ki	taraf	bulā	rahe	haiñ	ke	
idhar	āa		tum	farmāo	ke	Allah	hi	ki	hidāyat	hidāyat	hai	aur	hameiñ	hukm	hai	ke	hum	us	ke	liye	
gardan	rakh	deñ

arabicText: وَأَنْ أَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	to	keep	the	(obligatory)	prayer	established	and	to	fear	Him;	and	it	is	to	Him	that	you	are	to	
be	raised.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	Rab	hai	sāre	jahān	kā	aur	yeh	ke	Namāz	qāyim	rakho	aur	us	se	daro	aur	wohi	hai	jis	ki	taraf	
tumheñ		uthnā	hai.

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَيَوْمَ يَقُولُ كُن فَيَكُونُ ۚ قَوْلُهُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۚ وَلَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	perfectly	created	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	and	when	He	will	say	“Be”	on	the	
Day	(of	resurrection)	to	all	the	extinct	things,	it	will	happen	immediately;	His	Word	is	true;	and	it	
will	be	His	kingship	on	the	day	when	the	Trumpet	is	blown;	All	Knowing	of	all	the	hidden	and	the	
revealed;	and	He	only	is	the	Wise,	the	Aware.

arabicText: ۞ وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ ءَازَرَ أَتَتَّخِذُ أَصْنَامًا ءَالِهَةً ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰكَ وَقَوْمَكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	 when	 Ibrahim	 said	 to	 his	
father	 (paternal	 uncle)	 Azar,	 “What!	 You	
appoint	 idols	 as	 Gods?	 Indeed I	 find	 you	
and	 your	 people	in	 open	error.”	(Prophet	
Ibrahim	was	rightly	guided	since	birth)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 yād	 karo	 jab	 Ibrahim ne	 apne	 bāp	
Āazar se	 kaha	 kyā	 tum	 butoñ	 ko	 khudā	
banāte	 ho	 be-shak maiñ	 tumheñ aur	
tumhāri	qaum	ko	khuli	gumrāhi	meiñ	pātā	
huñ.

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُرِىٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ مَلَكُوتَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلِيَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُوقِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 likewise	 We	 showed	 Ibrahim	 the	
entire	 kingdom	 of	 the	 heavens	 and	 the	
earth	 and	 so	 that	 he	 be	 of	 those	 who	
believe	as	eyewitnesses.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	isi	tarah	hum	Ibrahim ko	dikhāte	hain	
sāri	bādshāhi	āasmāoñ	aur	zameen	ki	aur	
is	liye	ke	woh	‘ain-ul-yaqeen	wāloñ	me	ho	
jāyeñ

arabicText: فَلَمَّا جَنَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلَّيْلُ رَءَا كَوْكَبًۭا ۖ قَالَ هَـٰذَا رَبِّى ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَ قَالَ لَآ أُحِبُّ ٱلْـَٔافِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	the	night	became	dark	upon	him	
he	saw	a	star;	he	said	(to	Azar	/	the	people),	
“(You	portray	that)	this	is	my	Lord?”;	then	
when	it	set	he	said,	“I	do	not	like	the	things	
that	set.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	un	par	rāt	kā	andherā	āayā		ek	tārā	
dekhā	bole	ise	mera	Rab	thahrāte	ho	phir	
jab	woh	doob	gayā	bole	mujhe	khush	nahi	
āate	doobne	wāle.

arabicText: فَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلْقَمَرَ بَازِغًۭا قَالَ هَـٰذَا رَبِّى ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَ قَالَ لَئِن لَّمْ يَهْدِنِى رَبِّى لَأَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 when	 he	 saw	 the	 moon	 shining,	 he	
said,	“(You	proclaim	that)	this	is	my	Lord?”;	
then	when	it	set,	he	said,	“If	my	Lord	had	
not	 guided	 me	 *,	 I	 too	 would	 be	 one	 of	
these	 astray	 people.”	 (*	 Prophet	 Ibrahim	
was	rightly	guided	before	this	event).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 jab	 chāñd	 chamaktā	 dekhā	 bole	 ise	
mera	 Rab	 batāte	 ho	 phir	 jab	 woh	 doob	
gayā	kahā	agar	mujhe	merā	Rab	hidāyat	na	
kartā	to	maiñ	bhi	inhiñ	gumrāhoñ	me	hotā

arabicText: فَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلشَّمْسَ بَازِغَةًۭ قَالَ هَـٰذَا رَبِّى هَـٰذَآ أَكْبَرُ ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَتْ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 when	 he	 saw	 the	 sun	 shining	
brightly,	he	said,	“(You	say	that)	this	is	my	
Lord?	This	is	the	biggest	of	them	all!”;	then	
when	it	set	he	said,	“O	people!	I	do	not	have	
any	relation	with	the	whatever	you	ascribe	
as	partners	(to	Him).”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 jab	 sooraj	 jagmagātā	 dekhā	 bole	 ise	
mera	Rab	kahte	ho	yeh	to	un	sab	se	badā	
hai	phir	jab	woh	doob	gayā	kahā	aey	qaum!	
Maiñ	bezār	huñ	in	cheezoñ	se	jinheñ	 tum	
shareek	thahrāte	ho

arabicText: إِنِّى وَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِىَ لِلَّذِى فَطَرَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ حَنِيفًۭا ۖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“I	 have	 directed	 my	 attention	 towards	 Him	Who	 has	 created	 the	 heavens	 and	 the	 earth,	 am	
devoted	solely	to	Him,	and	am	not	of	the	polytheists.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Maiñ	ne	apna	muñh us	ki	taraf	kiyā	jis	ne	āasmān-o-zameen	banāye	ek	usi	kā	ho	kar	aur	maiñ	
mushreekoñ	meiñ	nahi.

arabicText: وَحَآجَّهُۥ قَوْمُهُۥ ۚ قَالَ أَتُحَـٰٓجُّوٓنِّى فِى ٱللَّهِ وَقَدْ هَدَىٰنِ ۚ وَلَآ أَخَافُ مَا تُشْرِكُونَ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ رَبِّى شَيْـًۭٔا ۗ وَسِعَ رَبِّى كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا ۗ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	his	people	argued	with	him;	he	said,	“What!	You	dispute	with	me	concerning	Allah?	So	He	
has	guided	me;	and	I	do	not	have	any	fear	of	whatever	you	ascribe	as	partners,	except	what	my	
Lord	 wills	(to	 happen);	 my	 Lord’s	 knowledge	 encompasses	 all	 things;	 so	 will	 you	 not	 accept	
advice?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	ki	Qaum		un	se	jhagadne	lagi	kahā	kyā	Allah	ke	bāre	me	mujh	se	jhagadte	ho	woh	to	mujhe	
rāh	batā	chukā	aur	mujhe	un	kā	dar	nahi	jinheñ	tum	shareek	batāte	ho	hāñ	jo	merā	hi	Rab	koi	bāt	
chāhe	mere	Rab	ka	Ílm		har	cheez	ko	muheet	hai	to	kyā	tum	naseehat	ko	nahi	mānte	.

arabicText: وَكَيْفَ أَخَافُ مَآ أَشْرَكْتُمْ وَلَا تَخَافُونَ أَنَّكُمْ أَشْرَكْتُم بِٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهِۦ عَلَيْكُمْ سُلْطَـٰنًۭا ۚ فَأَىُّ ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ أَحَقُّ بِٱلْأَمْنِ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	how	should	I	fear	whatever	you	ascribe	as	partners,	whilst	you	do	not	fear	that	you	have	
ascribed	partners	to	Allah - for	which	He	has	not	sent	down	on	you	any	proof?	So	which	of	the	
two	groups	has	more	right	to	refuge,	if	you	know?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	maiñ	tumhāre	shareekoñ	se	kyuñ	kar	daruñ	aur	tum	nahi	darte	ke	tum	ne	Allah	ka	shareek	
us	 ko	 thahrāyā	jis	 ki	 tum	 par	 us	 ne	 koi	 sanad	 na	 utāri	 to	 dono	 girohoñ	me	 amān	 kā	 ziyādah	
sazāwār	kaun hai	agar	tum	jānte	ho

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَلَمْ يَلْبِسُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنَهُم بِظُلْمٍ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلْأَمْنُ وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	believed	and	did	not	mix	it	with	
injustice	(disbelief),	 the	 refuge	is	 only	 for	
them,	and	only	they	are	on	guidance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	Imān lāye	aur	apne	Imān	me	kisi	ko		
na-haq	 ki	 āamezish	 na	 ki	 unhiñ	 ke	 liye	
amān	hai	aur	wohi	rāh	par	haiñ

arabicText: وَتِلْكَ حُجَّتُنَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ ۚ نَرْفَعُ دَرَجَـٰتٍۢ مَّن نَّشَآءُ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	this	is	Our	argument,	which	We	gave	
Ibrahim	 against	 his	 people;	 We	 raise	 to	
high	 ranks	 whomever	 We	 will;	 indeed	
your	Lord	is	Wise,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 yeh	 hamāri	 daleel	 hai	 ke hum	 ne	
Ibrahim	 ko	 us	 ki	 qaum par	 'atā	 farmāyi	
hum	jise	chāheñ	darjoñ	buland	kareñ	beshak	tumhārā	Rab	Ílm-o-hikmat	wālā	hai.

arabicText: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ ۚ كُلًّا هَدَيْنَا ۚ وَنُوحًا هَدَيْنَا مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِۦ دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُوسُفَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	bestowed	upon	him	Ishaq	(Isaac)	
and	Yaqub	(Jacob);	We	guided	all	of	them;	
and	We	guided	Nooh	 before	 them	and	 of	
his	descendants,	Dawud	and	Sulaiman	and	
Ayyub	and	Yusuf	and	Moosa	and	Haroon;	
and	 this	 is	 the	 way	 We	 reward	 the	
virtuous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hum	ne	unhieñ	Ishaaq	aur	Yāqoob ‘atā		
kiye	un	sab	ko	hum	ne	rāh	dikhāyi	aur	un	
se	 pahle Nooh ko	 rāh	 dikhāyi	 aur	 us	 ki	
aulād	 me	 se	 Dawood aur	 SulaImān	 	 aur	
Ayyub aur	Yousuf Aur	Mūsā aur	Hāroon ko	
aur	hum	aisā	hi	badla	dete	haiñ	nekokāroñ	
ko

arabicText: وَزَكَرِيَّا وَيَحْيَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَإِلْيَاسَ ۖ كُلٌّۭ مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	bestowed	upon	him	Ishaq	(Isaac)	
and	Yaqub	(Jacob);	We	guided	all	of	them;	
and	We	guided	Nooh	 before	 them	and	 of	
his	descendants,	Dawud	and	Sulaiman	and	
And	(We	guided)	Zakaria	and	Yahya	(John)	
and	Eisa	and	Elias;	all	these	are	worthy	of	
Our	proximity.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Zakariya aur	Yahya aur	Ísā		aur	Iliyās
ko	yeh	sab	hamāre	qurb	ke	lāyiq	haiñ

arabicText: وَإِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَيُونُسَ وَلُوطًۭا ۚ وَكُلًّۭا فَضَّلْنَا عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 Ismael	(Ishmael)	 and	 Yasa’a	(Elisha)	
and	 Yunus	(Jonah)	 and	 Lut	(Lot);	 and	 to	
each	 one	 during	 their	 times,	 We	 gave	
excellence	over	all	others.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Ismā'eel aur	Yas'a aur	Younus Aur	Lūt
ko	aur	hum	ne	her	ek	ko	us	ke	waqt	me	sab	
par	fazilat	di

arabicText: وَمِنْ ءَابَآئِهِمْ وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمْ وَإِخْوَٰنِهِمْ ۖ وَٱجْتَبَيْنَـٰهُمْ وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	 some	 of	 their	 ancestors	 and	 their	
descendants	 and	 their	 brothers;	 and	 We	
chose	 them	 and	 guided	 them	 to	 the	
Straight	Path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kuchh	un	ke	bāp	dādā	aur	aulād	aur	
bhāyiyoñ	me	 b'az	 ko	 aur	 hum	 ne	 unhieñ	
chun	liyā	aur	seedhi	rāh	dikhāyi	.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ ۚ وَلَوْ أَشْرَكُوا۟ لَحَبِطَ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	the	guidance	of	Allah,	which	He	may	
give	to	whomever	He	wills	among	His	bondmen;	and	had	they	ascribed	partners	(to	Allah), their	
deeds	would	have	been	wasted.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	Allah	ki	hidāyat	hai	ke	apne	bandoñ	me	jise	chāhe	de	aur	agar	woh	shirk	kare	to	zaroor	un	
kā	kyā	akārat	jātā	.

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحُكْمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ ۚ فَإِن يَكْفُرْ بِهَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ فَقَدْ وَكَّلْنَا بِهَا قَوْمًۭا لَّيْسُوا۟ بِهَا بِكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
These	are	the	ones	whom	We	gave	the	Book	and	the	wisdom	and	the	Prophethood;	so	if	these	
people	do	not	believe	in	it,	We	have	then	kept	ready	for	it	a	nation	who	do	not	reject	(the	truth).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	haiñ	jin	ko	hum	ne	kitāb	aur	hukm	aur	Nabuwwat ‘atā		ki	to	agar	yeh	log	is	se	munkar	hoñ	
to	hum	ne	is	ke	liye	ek	aisi	qaum		lagā	rakhi	hai	jo	inkār	wāli	nahi	.

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَى ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَبِهُدَىٰهُمُ ٱقْتَدِهْ ۗ قُل لَّآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ أَجْرًا ۖ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
These	are	the	ones	whom	Allah guided,	so	follow	their	guidance;	say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad
- peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“I	do	not	ask	from	you	any	fee	for	the	Qur’an;	it	is	nothing	but	
an	advice	to	the	entire	world.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Yahood	 ne	Allah	 ki	qadr	 na	jāni	jaisi	
chāhiye	thi	jab	bole	Allah	ne	kisi	ādmi	par	
kuchh	nahi	utārā	tum	 farmāo	kis	ne	utāri	
woh	 kitāb	 jo	Mūsā lāye	 the	 raushani	 aur	
logoñ	ke	liye	hidāyat	jis	ke	tum	ne	alag	alag	
kāgaz	banā	liye	zāhir	karte	ho	aur	bahut	sā	
chupā	lete	ho	aur	tumheñ	woh	sikhāyā	jātā
hai	jo	tum	ko	m'āloom	tha	na	tumhāre	bāp	
dādā	ko	Allah	kaho	phir	unhieñ	chhod	do	
un	ki	behoodagi	me	kheltā	.

arabicText: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦٓ إِذْ قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ بَشَرٍۢ مِّن شَىْءٍۢ ۗ قُلْ مَنْ أَنزَلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِهِۦ مُوسَىٰ نُورًۭا وَهُدًۭى لِّلنَّاسِ ۖ تَجْعَلُونَهُۥ قَرَاطِيسَ تُبْدُونَهَا وَتُخْفُونَ كَثِيرًۭا ۖ وَعُلِّمْتُم مَّا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنتُمْ وَلَآ ءَابَآؤُكُمْ ۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ ذَرْهُمْ فِى خَوْضِهِمْ يَلْعَبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	 (the	 Jews)	 did	 not	 realise	 (or	
appreciate)	the	importance	of	Allah as	was	
required	 when	 they	 said,	 “Allah has	 not	
sent	 down	 anything	 upon	 any	 human	
being”;	say,	“Who	has	sent	down	the	Book	
which	Moosa	brought,	a	light	and	guidance	
for	mankind,	which	you	have	divided	into	
different	 papers,	 some	 which	 you	 show	
and	hide	most	of	them?	And	(by	which)	you	
are	taught	what	you	did	not	know	nor	did	
your	forefathers?”	Say,	“Allah”	- then	leave	
them	playing	in	their	indecency.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	hai	ke	barkat	wāli	Kitāb	hum	ne	
utāri	tasdeeq	farmāti	un	kitāboñ	ki	jo	āage	
thiñ	 aur	 is	 liye	 ke	 tum	 dar	 sunāo	 sab	
bastiyoñ	ke	sardār	ko	aur	jo	koi	sāre	jahāñ	
me	is	ke	gird	haiñ	aur	woh	jo	āakhirat	par	
Imān		lāte	haiñ	is	kitāb	par	Imān		laāte	haiñ	
aur	apni	Namāz	ki	hifāzat	karte	haiñ

arabicText: وَهَـٰذَا كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ مُبَارَكٌۭ مُّصَدِّقُ ٱلَّذِى بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَلِتُنذِرَ أُمَّ ٱلْقُرَىٰ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ ۖ وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 this	 is	 the	 blessed	 Book	 which	 We	
have	 sent	 down,	 confirming	 the	 Books	
preceding	 it,	 and	 in	 order	 that	 you	 may	
warn	the	leader	of	all	villages	and	all	those	
around	 it	 in	 the	 entire	 world;	 and	 those	
who	believe	in	the	Hereafter	accept	faith	in	
this	Book,	and	guard	their	prayers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	us	se	badh	kar	zālim	kaun		jo	Allah	par	
jhoot	bāñdhe	yā	kahe	mujhe	hui	aur	usey	
kuchh	waḥi	na	huyi	aur	jo	kahe	abhi	maiñ	
utārtā	huñ	aisā	jaisā	khudā	ne	utārā	aur	kabhi	tum	dekho	jis	waqt	zālim	mout	ki	sakhtiyoñ	me	
haiñ	aur	farishte	hāth	phailāye	huye	haiñ	ke	nikālo	apni	jāneñ	āaj	tumheñ		khuwāri	kā	‘aƶāb	diyā	
jāye	gā	badla	us	kā	yeh	ke	Allah	par	jhoot	lagāte	the	aur	us	ki	Āayatoñ	se	takabbur	karte	.

arabicText: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ قَالَ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ وَلَمْ يُوحَ إِلَيْهِ شَىْءٌۭ وَمَن قَالَ سَأُنزِلُ مِثْلَ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ ۗ وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ فِى غَمَرَٰتِ ٱلْمَوْتِ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ بَاسِطُوٓا۟ أَيْدِيهِمْ أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمُ ۖ ٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَوْنَ عَذَابَ ٱلْهُونِ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ غَيْرَ ٱلْحَقِّ وَكُنتُمْ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ تَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Who	 is	 more	 unjust	 than	 one	 who	
fabricates	lies	against	Allah or	says,	“I	have	
received	 divine	 inspiration”,	 whereas	 he	
has	not	been	inspired	at	all	- and	one	who	
says,	“I	will	now	reveal	something	similar	
to	what	Allah has	sent	down”?	And	if	you	
see	 when	 the	 unjust	 are	 in	 the	 throes	 of	
death	and	the	angels	are	with	their	hands	
outstretched;	 (saying)	 “Surrender	 your	
souls;	 this	 day	 you	 shall	 be	 given	 a	
disgraceful	punishment	- the	recompense	of	your	fabricating	lies	against	Allah,	and	your	scorning	
His	signs.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak		tum	hamāre	pās	akele	āaye	jaisā	hum	ne	tumheñ		pahli	bār	paidā	kiyā	tha	aur	peeth	
peeche	chod	āaye	woh	jo	māl	o	mat'a	hum	ne	tumheñ		diyā	tha	aur	hum	tumhāre	sāth	tumhāre	
un	sifārishoñ	ko	nahi	dekhte	jin	kā	tum	apne	me	sājhā	batāte	the	be-shak	tumhāre	āpas	ki	dor	
kat	gayi	aur	tum	se	gaye	jo	d'awe	karte	the

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ جِئْتُمُونَا فُرَٰدَىٰ كَمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۢ وَتَرَكْتُم مَّا خَوَّلْنَـٰكُمْ وَرَآءَ ظُهُورِكُمْ ۖ وَمَا نَرَىٰ مَعَكُمْ شُفَعَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمْتُمْ أَنَّهُمْ فِيكُمْ شُرَكَـٰٓؤُا۟ ۚ لَقَد تَّقَطَّعَ بَيْنَكُمْ وَضَلَّ عَنكُم مَّا كُنتُمْ تَزْعُمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	indeed	you	(the	disbelievers)	have	now	come	to	Us	alone	as	We	had	created	you	at	first,	and	
you	have	left	behind	you	all	the	wealth	and	riches	We	had	bestowed	upon	you;	and	We	do	not	
see	your	intercessors	along	with	you,	whom	you	claimed	to	possess	a	share	in	you;	indeed	the	
link	between	yourselves	is	cut	off,	and	you	have	lost	all	what	you	contended.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	Allah	dāne	aur	guthli	ko	cheerne	
wālā	 hai	 zindā	 ko	 murdā	 se	 nikāle	 aur	
murdā	 ko	 zindā	 se	 nikālne	 wālā	 yeh	 hai		
Allah	tum	kahañ	aundhe	jāte	ho.

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ فَالِقُ ٱلْحَبِّ وَٱلنَّوَىٰ ۖ يُخْرِجُ ٱلْحَىَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَيِّتِ وَمُخْرِجُ ٱلْمَيِّتِ مِنَ ٱلْحَىِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤْفَكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	it	is	Allah Who	splits	the	grain	and	
the	 seed;	it	is	He	Who	 brings	 forth	living	
from	 the	 dead,	 and	 it	 is	 He	 Who	 brings	
forth	dead	from	the	living;	such	is	Allah;	so	
where	are	you	reverting?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tāreeki	 chāk	 kar	 ke	 subah	 nikālne	 wālā	
aur	 us	 ne	 rāt	 ko	 chain	 banāyā	 aur	 sooraj	
aur	chānd	ko	hisāb	yeh	saadhā	(muqarrar	
kiyā	huā)	haI	zabardast	jānne	wāle	kā

arabicText: فَالِقُ ٱلْإِصْبَاحِ وَجَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ سَكَنًۭا وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ حُسْبَانًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	breaks	dawn	(by	splitting	the	
dark);	 and	 He	 has	 made	 the	 night	 a	
calmness,	 and	 the	 sun	 and	 the	 moon	 a	
count	(for	time);	this	is	the	command	set	by	
the	Almighty,	the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 wohi	 hai	 jis	 ne	 tumhāre	 liye	 tāre	
banāye	ke	In	se	rāh	pāo	Khushki	aur	tari	ke	
andheroñ	me	hum	ne	nishāniyāñ	mufassil	
bayān	kar	diñ	‘ilm		wāloñ	ke	liye	.

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلنُّجُومَ لِتَهْتَدُوا۟ بِهَا فِى ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ ۗ قَدْ فَصَّلْنَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	has	created	the	stars	for	
you,	 so	 that	 you	 may	 find	 your	 way	 by	
them	in	 the	 darkness	 of	 the	land	and	 the	
sea;	indeed	We	have	explained	Our	verses	
in	detail	for	the	people	of	knowledge.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi	hai	jin	se	tum	ko	ek	jān	se	paidā	
kiyā	phir	kahiñ	tumheñ		thahernā	hai	aur	
kahin	 amānat	 rahnā	 be-shak hum	 ne	
mufassil	 Āayatieñ	 bayān	 kar	 diñ	 samajh	
wāloñ	ke	liye

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍۢ وَٰحِدَةٍۢ فَمُسْتَقَرٌّۭ وَمُسْتَوْدَعٌۭ ۗ قَدْ فَصَّلْنَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَفْقَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	has	created	 you	 from	a	
single	soul	- then	you	have	to	stop	over	*	in	
one	place	and	stay	entrusted	**	in	another;	
indeed	 We	 have	 explained	 Our	 verses	 in	
detail	for	people	of	understanding.	(*	This	
earth.	**	The	grave.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi	hai	jis	ne	āasmān		se	pāni	utārā	
to	hum	ne	us	se	har	ugne	wāli	cheez	nikāli	
to	hum	ne	us	se	nikāli	sabzi	jis	me	se	dāne	
nikalte	 haiñ	 ek	 dusre	 par	 chadhhe	 huyē	
aur	Khujoor	ke	gābhe	se	pās	pās	ghuchche	
aur	Angoor	ke	bāgh	aur	Zaitun	aur	Anār	kisi	bāt	me	milte	aur	kisi	bāt	me	alag	us	kā	phal	dekho	
jab	phale	aur	us	ka	paknā	be-shak		is	me	nishāniyañ	haiñ	Imān wālo	ke	liye

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦ نَبَاتَ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ فَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهُ خَضِرًۭا نُّخْرِجُ مِنْهُ حَبًّۭا مُّتَرَاكِبًۭا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّخْلِ مِن طَلْعِهَا قِنْوَانٌۭ دَانِيَةٌۭ وَجَنَّـٰتٍۢ مِّنْ أَعْنَابٍۢ وَٱلزَّيْتُونَ وَٱلرُّمَّانَ مُشْتَبِهًۭا وَغَيْرَ مُتَشَـٰبِهٍ ۗ ٱنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ثَمَرِهِۦٓ إِذَآ أَثْمَرَ وَيَنْعِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكُمْ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	sends	down	water	from	
the	sky;	so	with	it	We	produced	all	things	
that	 grow;	 hence	 We	 produce	 from	 it	
vegetation	 from	 which	 We	 bring	 forth	
grains	in	 clusters;	and	 from	 the	 pollen	 of	
dates,	 dense	 bunches	 - and	 gardens	 of	
grapes	and	olives	and	pomegranates,	similar	in	some	ways	and	unlike	in	some;	look	at	its	fruit	
when	it	bears	yield,	and	its	ripening;	indeed	in	it	are	signs	for	the	people	who	believe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	 kā	 shareek	 thahrāyā	jinnoñ	 ko	 hālāñke	 usi	 ne	in	 ko	 banāyā	aur	 us	 ke	liye	 bete	aur	
betiyāñ	gardh liñ jahālat	se	pāki	aur	bar-tari	hai	us	ko	un	ki	bātoñ	se

arabicText: وَجَعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ شُرَكَآءَ ٱلْجِنَّ وَخَلَقَهُمْ ۖ وَخَرَقُوا۟ لَهُۥ بَنِينَ وَبَنَـٰتٍۭ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍۢ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	out	of	sheer	ignorance	they	have	ascribed	jinns	as	partners	of	Allah,	whereas	it	is	He	Who	
created	them,	and	they	have	invented	sons	and	daughters	for	Him!	Purity	and	Supremacy	is	to	
Him,	from	all	what	they	ascribe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	 kā	 shareek	 thahrāyā	jinnoñ	 ko	 hālāñke	 usi	 ne	in	 ko	 banāyā	aur	 us	 ke	liye	 bete	aur	
betiyāñ	gardh liñ jahālat	se	pāki	aur	bar-tari	hai	us	ko	un	ki	bātoñ	se

arabicText: بَدِيعُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُۥ وَلَدٌۭ وَلَمْ تَكُن لَّهُۥ صَـٰحِبَةٌۭ ۖ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۢ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
The	Originator	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	how	can	He	possibly	have	a	child	when,	in	fact,	He	
does	not	have	a	spouse?	And	He	has	created	all	things;	and	He	knows	everything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be	kisi	namoone	ke	āasmanoñ		aur	zameen	ka	banāne	wālā	us	ke	bachcha	kahāñ	se	ho	hālāñke	is	
ki	aurat	nahi	aur	us	ne	har	cheez	paidā	ki	aur	woh	sab	kuchh	jāntā	hai.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ خَـٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَكِيلٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Such	 is	 Allah,	 your	 Lord;	 and	 none	 is	
worthy	of	worship	except	Him;	the	Creator	
of	all	things	- therefore	worship	Him;	and	
He	is	the	Trustee	over	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	hai	Allah	tumhārā	Rab	us	ke	siwā	kisi	
ki	bandagi	nahi	har	cheez	kā	banāne	wālā	
to	 usey	 poojo	 aur	 woh	 har	 cheez	 par	
nigahbān	hai

arabicText: لَّا تُدْرِكُهُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدْرِكُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
Eyes	do	not	encompass	Him	- and	all	eyes	
are	 within	 His	 domain	 *;	 He	 is	 the	 Most	
Subtle,	 the	 Fully	 Aware.	 (*	 control	 /	
knowledge)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Āañkheñ	 usey	 ehāta	 nahi	 kartiñ	 aur	 sab	
āañkhieñ	us	ke	ehāte	meiñ	haiñ	aur	wohi	
hai	nihāyat	bātin	poorā	khabardār

arabicText: قَدْ جَآءَكُم بَصَآئِرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ فَمَنْ أَبْصَرَ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَنْ عَمِىَ فَعَلَيْهَا ۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيْكُم بِحَفِيظٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
“Enlightening	 proofs	 came	 to	 you	 from	
your	 Lord;	 so	whoever	 observes,	it	is	 for	
his	own	good;	and	whoever	is	blind,	it	is	for	
his	 own	 harm;	 and	 I	 am	 not	 a	 guardian	
over	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumhāre pās	 āañkhieñ	 kholne	 wāli	
daleelieñ	āayiñ	tumhāre	Rab	ki	taraf	se	to	
jis	ne	dekhā	to	apne	bhale	ko	aur	jo	andhā	
huā	 to	 apne	 bure	 ko	 aur	 maiñ	 tum	 par	
nigehbān	nahi

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ وَلِيَقُولُوا۟ دَرَسْتَ وَلِنُبَيِّنَهُۥ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	this	is	how	We	explain	Our	verses	in	
different	ways	 that	 they	(the	disbelievers)	
may	 say	 to	 you,	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him),	“You	have	studied”	- and	 to	make	it	
clear	for	the	people	of	knowledge.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hum	isi	 tarah	āayatieñ	 tarah	 tarah	se	
bayān	 karte	 haiñ	 aur	 is	 liye	 ke	 kāfir	 bol	
utheñ	 ke	 tum	 to	 padhe	 ho	 aur	 is	 liye	 ke	
usey	Ílm wāloñ	par	wāzeh	kar	deñ

arabicText: ٱتَّبِعْ مَآ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Follow	 what	 is	 divinely	 revealed	 to	 you	
from	 your	 Lord;	 there	 is	 none	 worthy	 of	
worship	except	Him;	and	 turn	away	 from	
the	polytheists.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	 par	 chalo	 jo	 tumheñ tumhāre	 Rab	 ki	
taraf	 se	 waḥi	 hoti	 hai	 us	 ke	 siwā	 koi	
m'abood	 nahi	 aur	 mushrikoñ	 se	 muñh		
pher	lo	.

arabicText: وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَآ أَشْرَكُوا۟ ۗ وَمَا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَفِيظًۭا ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	Allah willed,	they	would	not	ascribe	
(any	 partner	 to	 Him);	We	 have	 not	made	
you	as	a	guardian	over	them;	and	you	are	
not	responsible	for	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	chāhtā	to	woh	shareek	na	karte	
aur	hum	ne	tumheñ		un	par	nigehbān	nahi	
kiyā	 aur	 tum	 un	 par	 kadode	 (nigahbān)	
nahi	.

arabicText: وَلَا تَسُبُّوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَسُبُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ عَدْوًۢا بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍۢ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ زَيَّنَّا لِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ عَمَلَهُمْ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِم مَّرْجِعُهُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Do	not	abuse	 those	whom	 they	worship	besides	Allah lest	 they	become	disrespectful	 towards	
Allah’s	Majesty,	through	injustice	and	ignorance;	likewise,	in	the	eyes	of	every	nation,	We	have	
made	their	deeds	appear	good	- then	towards	their	Lord	they	have	to	return	and	He	will	inform	
them	of	what	they	used	to	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unhieñ	gāli	na	do	jin	ko	woh	Allah	ke	siwā	poojte	haiñ	ke	woh	Allah	ki	shān	me	be-adabi	
kareñ	ge	ziyādati	aur	jahālat	se	yuñ	hi	hum	ne	har	ummat	ko	nigāh	me	us	ke	amal	bhale	kar	diye	
haiñ	phir	unheiñ	apne	Rab	ki	taraf	phirnā	hai	aur	woh	unhieñ	batā	de	gā	jo	karte	the

arabicText: وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ لَئِن جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَةٌۭ لَّيُؤْمِنُنَّ بِهَا ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَمَا يُشْعِرُكُمْ أَنَّهَآ إِذَا جَآءَتْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	 swore	 by	Allah vehemently	 in	 their	 oaths	 that	 if	 any	 sign	 came	 to	 them,	 they	 will	
certainly	believe	in	it;	say,	“The	signs	are	with	Allah,	and	what	do	you	people	know	that	if	they	
came	to	them,	they	will	not	believe.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unhoñ	ne	Allah	ki	qasam	khāyi	apne	halaf	me	poori	koshish	se	ke	agar	un	ke	pās		koi	nishāni	
āayi	to	zaroor	us	par	Imān		laāyeñ	ge	tum	farmā	do	ke	nishāniyañ	to	Allah	ke	pās	haiñ	aur	tumheñ		
kyā	khabar	ke	jab	woh	āayeñ	to	yeh	Imān na	lāyeñ	ge.

arabicText: وَنُقَلِّبُ أَفْـِٔدَتَهُمْ وَأَبْصَـٰرَهُمْ كَمَا لَمْ يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۢ وَنَذَرُهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	revert	their	hearts	and	their	eyes	- the	way they	had	not	believed	the	first	time	– and	We	
leave	them	to	keep	wandering	blindly	in	their	rebellion.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hum	pher	dete	haiñ	un	ke	diloñ	aur	āñkhoñ	ko	jaisā	woh	pahli	bār	us	par	Imān na	lāye	the	aur	
unhieñ	chhod	dete	haiñ	ke	apni	sarkashi	meiñ	bhatkā	kareiñ.
